data.heading: We take Open Source seriously
data.content: Open Source Software is at the heart of Gojek. Without it, none of our achievements would have ever been possible. Today, we actively maintain a host of Free and Open Source Software projects as we understand their importance to the community. For a full list of our contributions, please checkout our GitHub.

projects.description: An enhanced HTTP client for Go
